description: Bug Hunting Framework Development Environment with Background Agent Support
name: Bug Hunting Framework Agent
install: cd /home/ubuntu/projects/bug-hunting-framework && pip install -r backend/requirements.txt && cd frontend && pnpm install
start: echo 'Bug Hunting Framework Agent Ready' && echo 'Python: $(python --version)' && echo 'Node: $(node --version)' && echo 'Docker: $(docker --version)'

terminals.name: Initial Setup
terminals.description: Initializes the bug hunting framework with all services running in the background

terminals.name: Backend Development
terminals.command: cd /home/ubuntu/projects/bug-hunting-framework/backend && pip install -r requirements.txt && docker exec -it bug-hunting-backend bash
terminals.description: Runs the Django backend development server with hot reloading

terminals.name: Frontend Development
terminals.command: cd /home/ubuntu/projects/bug-hunting-framework/frontend && npm install && docker exec -it bug-hunting-frontend bash
terminals.description: Runs the Next.js frontend development server with hot reloading

terminals.name: Database Management
terminals.command: cd /home/ubuntu/projects/bug-hunting-framework && docker exec -it bug-hunting-db psql -U postgres -d bug_hunting_framework
terminals.description: Opens PostgreSQL command line interface for database management

terminals.name: Agent Monitoring
terminals.description: Shows the status of background agents and their health

terminals.name: Agent Logs
terminals.description: Displays real-time logs from background agents

terminals.name: Docker Services
terminals.description: Shows the status of all Docker services in the bug hunting framework

terminals.name: Backend Test Runner
terminals.description: Runs the backend test suite with verbose output

terminals.name: Code Quality
terminals.description: Runs code formatting, linting, and type checking
